actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Railroad Safety Act of 1970 to direct the Secretary of Transportation to issue regulations requiring locomotives and rear cars to be equipped with bulletproof glass.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Railroad Safety Act of 1970 to direct the Secretary of Transportation to issue regulations requiring that all the glass in the exposed windows of railroad locomotives and rear cars be bulletproof.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Railroad Safety Act of 1970 to direct the Secretary of Transportation to issue regulations requiring locomotives and rear cars to be equipped with bulletproof glass.
